content.text:
# Indian Telly Award for Best Anchor

Indian Telly Award for Best Anchor is an award given by [http://www.indiantelevision.com Indiantelevision.com] as part of its annual Indian Telly Awards for TV serials, to recognize a person who has hosted a television reality show and been appreciated by the Indian audience.
Superlatives
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center"
|- style="height:4.5em;"
! style="width:350px;"|Superlative
! colspan="2" style="width:600px;"|Best Anchor
|- style="height:4.5em;"
| style="width:350px;"|Artiste with most awards
| style="width:500px;"|Amitabh Bachchan
Manish Paul
| style="width:100px;"|3
|- style="height:4.5em;"
|Artiste with most nominations

|Artiste with most nominations(without ever winning)

| style="width:100px;"|3
|- style="height:4.5em;"
|}
List of winners (Popular)

*2001 Not Awarded
*2002 Amitabh Bachchan – Kaun Banega Crorepati
